properties.areaDesc: Davidson, TN; Wilson, TN; Cheatham, TN; Sumner, TN
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 3 at 1:29AM CST until March 3 at 3:30AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Central Davidson County in Middle Tennessee...
Southwestern Sumner County in Middle Tennessee...
Northwestern Wilson County in Middle Tennessee...
East central Cheatham County in Middle Tennessee...

* Until 330 AM CST.

* At 128 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing
heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or
expected to begin shortly.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Lebanon, Ashland City, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount
Juliet, Goodlettsville, Lakewood, Hermitage, Belinda City, Old
Hickory, Joelton, Rural Hill, Bells Bend, Whites Creek and Beaman
Park.
properties.instruction:
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.
